message: When I open my eyes, I see Koujaku and Clear looking at me.
Noiz is tapping away at his keyboard, his rabbit Allmates scattered around him.

name: 紅雀
message: "Now that Aoba's back, we can let loose. Let's finish these guys and get outta here!"
Koujaku retrieves his sword and flashes a bold smile.
Mink glances over his shoulder while fighting off a half-dozen guards and their Allmates.
Brandishing his sword, Koujaku charges into the fray.
...Wait. Where's Ren? He should have come back with me.
When I turn, I see him there. Though parts of his body are still corrupted, his eyes are sharp and clear.
I can't help but smile when I see the look on his face.
It worked. Those are the same eyes that have always given me the strength to fight.
I stand up and look at Ren and Clear.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let's get in there too and finish this."

Koujaku swings his blade in wide, sweeping arcs, sending enemies flying three or four at a time.

Mink, meanwhile, lays about with his fists. No one he hits gets back up again.
We take position a little to the rear. While felling one guard with a roundhouse kick, I order Ren to unleash his power.
With his arms transformed into weapon mode, he cuts through Allmates like butter.

name: ウサギモドキリーダー

message: Noiz backs us up with his own Allmates while hammering away on his keyboard.

name: ウサギモドキリーダー
